snippet: A.I.A. said the acquisition will catapult it to the No. 1 position in Malaysia's lucrative life insurance market. For the Dutch insurer ING, it is the first major deal in its plan to divest its Asian assets.
abstract: A.I.A. said the acquisition will catapult it to the No. 1 position in Malaysia's lucrative life insurance market. For the Dutch insurer ING, it is the first major deal in its plan to divest its Asian assets.

headline.main: A.I.A. to Pay $1.7 Billion for ING's Malaysia Business
